title: (x) Radiohead album cover "I Might Be Wrong" - Letter Gothic {Patricia}
content:
Hello,   
I'm trying to identify the typeface used on the album cover for Radiohead's EP "I Might Be Wrong" released a couple years ago. A copy of the image is below.   
 ![I Might Be Wrong EP cover](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224709im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/42976.jpg)
author: daniel_genser

comments.content: Actually, Eduardo, I don't think it's Orator. (That was my first guess, too.) The diagonal shape of the S of the sample is different from Orator's more closed, DIN-ish shape.
